attributes.action: Sack all members of Haringey Councils Social Service Team that failed the 17 month old baby boy that was horribly abused by his carers.. or at least hold a full public enquiry into this childs death.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This 17 month old child was horribly and wickedly abused by people around him that were charged with his care..  Social services were VERY AWARE of this baby's plight.. His back was broken in two places and he suffered the most appauling and horrific death.. Those in Haringey Council that visited this childs home over 60 times should be sacked IMMEDIATLEY. Responsibility must lay somewhere..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
